text: @NYGovCuomo Thank you for addressing the mental aspect of life in a pandemic. @LarryHogan please do the same in MD. Every family has one person abosorbing their whole family’s stress. They need support. #mentalhealth #AnxietyRelief #CoronavirusPandemic
